src:
Deretan Pemain Bola Dunia Miliki Anak dari Lebih Satu Wanita
01 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Beberapa pesepak bola top dunia diberi anugerah penampilan menarik. Tak hanya itu, para pemain bola tersebut bergelimang harta. Tak heran, mereka digandrungi wanita-wanita cantik. Namun, ada juga yang memanfaatkan ketampanan, kepopulerannya hingga kekayaannya untuk mengikat hati wanita.
Ya, pesepak bola kelas dunia itu biasanya tak jauh dari berbagai skandal, satu di antaranya ialah rumor hubungan spesial dengan banyak wanita. Bahkan, beberapa di antaranya memutuskan untuk tertutup dari media, atau menunjukkan secara langsung tentang hubungan dengan wanita lalin.
Sejumlah pemain terkenal pun banyak yang diketahui memiliki anak dari lebih dari satu wanita, baik karena hubungan singkat atau karena terlanjur jatuh cinta. Melansir Bola.com, berikut rangkuman dari Sokkaa.com soal 5 pemain bola yang memiliki anak dari beberapa wanita.
text:
Rows of Soccer Players Have Children of More Than One Woman
01 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Some of the world's top footballers are given the gift of attractive performances. Not only that, the ball players are swarming with wealth. Not surprisingly, they are loved by beautiful women. However, there are also those who use good looks, their popularity to their wealth to bind a woman's heart.
Yes, world-class footballers are usually not far from various scandals, one of which is the rumor of a special relationship with many women. In fact, some of them decided to be closed from the media, or show directly about relationships with other women.
A number of well-known players are also known to have children from more than one woman, either because of a short relationship or because they are already in love. Launch Bola.com, following a summary of Sokkaa.com about 5 soccer players who have children from several women.
